DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the dose-limiting toxicity (DLT), maximum tolerated dose (MTD) and recommended Phase II dose of ixabepilone in combination with capecitabine in Japanese participants with metastatic breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study of Ixabepilone in Combination With Capecitabine in Japanese Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Women ≥ 20 years Histologically or cytologically confirmed diagnosis of adenocarcinoma originating in the breast Number of prior chemotherapy lines of treatment in the metastatic setting ≥3
